page.title: 17Traffic Survey 1
page.content: It was decided by the group to survey the traffic using the 4 main roads by the village shopping area and the Primary School. The 4 roads surveyed were {Brookley Road, Sway Road, Grigg {Lane and the Lyndhurst Road.}The roads were studied for a period of 45 minutes at different times of the day. The vehicles were classified into{ {Cars,Lorries,Motor {Bikes,Buses,Bicycles,Pedestrians and {Cars with Caravans. In Brookley Road the results were averaged and found to be: {Cars }110 per 45 minutes {Lorries}29 per 45 minutes {Motor Bikes}2 per 45 minutes {Buses}1 per 45 minutes {Bicycles}9 per 45 minutes {Pedestrians}87 per 45 minutes {Cars with Caravans}0 per 45 minutes.
